```{r loadpackages}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```

```{r}
loc_tags <- read.csv("locoflie.csv")
```

```{r}
loc_tags %>%
  group_by(claimant_party) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) %>%
  kable()
```


```{r}
loc_tags %>%
  group_by(location) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) %>%
  kable()

loc_tags %>%
  filter(location == "Social Media") %>%
  group_by(location.extra) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) %>%
  kable()

loc_tags %>%
  filter(location == "TV Appearance") %>%
  group_by(location.extra) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) %>%
  kable()
```

```{r}
loc_tags %>%
  group_by(location, claimant_party) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = location, values_from = count) %>%
  kable()
```
